title: What typeface is this??
content:
Thanks everyone,  
Just need to know the typeface that LETS and LOST is in?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090619091851im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1329-artworkimage_3486.jpg)
author: ramonNYC

comments.content:
I think weâ€™ve had this before. The script is the Spoleto/Aktuelle/Athletic Script/OptiSport Script font, that we seem to get a lot of questions about.

- Mike Yanega
